author: Toni Shope
text:
A locality is looking for examples of customer service goals for a firefighter.  These are individual goals for an annual evaluation using the SMART goal criteria (specific, measurable, attainable, realistic and timely).   
Thank you for any assistance.
title: Customer Service Goals for Firefighter
